headline: SASTRA University
text:
B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering. Graduated with 3.5/4 GPA with First Class with Distinction.

Favourite subjects are Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Database Management Systems and ofcourse Programming in C, C++ and JAVA ! :D

headline: Freshworks
text:
• Developed Cross-browser compatible Responsive UI for new features, enhancements and designs for Freshservice (Service Desk) which is used by 150,000 businesses worldwide.
  • Developed a scalable custom form builder which is used across Freshservice. Helped reduce the development cost, effort and time by 8 weeks.
  • Upgraded web framework used in Freshservice which reduced web page load times by 40%.

headline: Arizona State University
text:
Wanted to pursue Master's in Computer Science at Arizona State University. Currently studying in the second semester. CGPA: 3.78


Subjects undertaken:

  • Data Visualization
  • Statistical Machine Learning
  • Mobile Computing
  • Foundation of Algorithms
  • Distributed Database Systems
  • Information Assurance and Security
